The transaction will immediately be\ndisplayed in your Swap!t Transactions page.
Swap transactions cannot be reversed after\ntapping the “Swap” button above.
In order to protect your funds,\nyour PIN is required when using Swap!t.

Swap!t lets users instantly swap between digital currencies, it is decentralized, simple, easy and there are no trading fees. 

The left side provides the currency you would like to swap out of (sell), and the right side provides the currency you would like to swap into (buy). 

After entering the amount, simply tap "Swap" and the currencies will respectively be withdrawn and deposited automatically. The transaction status will be displayed instantly but please note that different coins have different confirmation times. 

Swap!t currently offers BTC and VHKD pairs, with other pairs coming soon! 

Swap!t is the leading decentralized wallet-integrated trading system, used by millions around the world.
Swap!t does not currently support this trading pair.
Only IDCW backup seeds are supported.
If you have forgotten your password, \nplease contact support@idcw.io
IP address has been used too frequently
As a merchant, you will receive buy and sell orders matched by the system. You can offer a price and make a deal.

1. Fill in fiat currencies and fund amounts to provide liquidity to receive sell orders; fill in fiat currencies to provide liquidity to receive buy orders.\n\n2. Submit and deposit corresponding security deposits. Customer service will validate and open the merchant permission within 24 hours.

1. IDCW will deduct a certain amount from the merchant’s deposit as a service fee. Please see Deposit Trade Rules for details. Users do not pay any fees.

2. If a merchant is complained about by the user for insufficient payment, IDCW shall rule the merchant as the breaching party and deduct an amount from the security deposit as a breach of contract. Please see Deposit Trade Rules for details.

3. If the merchant cancels a trade while processing the user’s sell order, the merchant will be deemed at fault. If the merchant exceeds the number of allowable defaults, IDCW will deduct a certain amount from the security deposit as breach of contract. Please see Deposit Trade Rules for details.

4. If the deposit is inadequate, the merchant is required to place supplement amount to the deposit account before receiving any orders.
The deposit could be placed in various digital currencies.
I have read the above. Apply now
Your merchant status has been\nsuspended, please add more margin.
Miner\'s fee shall be deducted from the balance.\nIf balance is inadequate, it will be deducted from sent amount.
Congratulations! You have successfully applied.\nPlease wait patiently, we will complete\nthe review within 24 hours.
Click the coin name to check the margin history list.\nDrag to arrange debit order.

I have read and agree to
1. 买家需要在90s内选择卖家并确认买入;
2. 若无卖家响应时系统会自动取消或显示超时，则该笔卖 单不成功，您可以再次选择币种和额度进行确认并购买;
3. 若有卖家响应时您取消了交易,则该笔买单违约,若24小时之内超过3次违约您将被禁止交易24小时。
1. 卖家需要在90s内选择买家并确认卖出;
2. 若无买家响应时系统会自动取消或显示超时,则该笔卖单不成功,您可以再次选择币种和额度进行确认卖出;
3. 若有买家响应时您取消了交易,则该笔卖单违约,若24小时之内超过3次违约您将被禁止交易24小时。
